Uses of Class
model.Location

    • Uses of Location in model

      Methods in model that return Location 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Location Location.above()
      Return location just above original one
      Location Location.add(Location loc)
      Method add() adds each component of location (x,y,z) of the same world from given location to location from which the method was called.
      Location Location.below()
      Return location just below original one
      Location World.getHighestLocationAt(Location ground)
      It returns the location representing the ground level at the location (x,*,z) given as argument
      Location Player.getLocation()
      Trivial getter
      Location Player.move(int dx, int dy, int dz)
      If (x,y,z) is the player’s current location, it ‘moves’ the player to location (x+dx,y+dy,z+dz).
      Location Location.multiply(double factor)
      Method used to scale the position in the specified world.
      Location Location.substract(Location loc)
      Method used to substract locations in the same world.
      Location Location.zero()
      Method used to set all components of location to zero.
      Methods in model that return types with arguments of type Location 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<Location> Location.getNeighborhood()
      It returns the locations adjacent to this one.
      Methods in model with parameters of type Location 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Location Location.add(Location loc)
      Method add() adds each component of location (x,y,z) of the same world from given location to location from which the method was called.
      static boolean Location.check(Location l)
      Class method that checks that the values ‘x’, ‘y’, ‘z’ from given location l are within the limits of the given world.
      double Location.distance(Location loc)
      Method distance measures the distance between two locations placed in the same world.
      Block World.getBlockAt(Location loc)
      It returns the block in the given location or null if there is no block there
      Location World.getHighestLocationAt(Location ground)
      It returns the location representing the ground level at the location (x,*,z) given as argument
      ItemStack World.getItemsAt(Location loc)
      It returns the items that are in the given location, or null if there are none
      java.lang.String World.getNeighbourhoodString(Location loc)
      It returns a string representing the locations adjacent to the given location
      boolean World.isFree(Location l)
      It checks if the given location is free, i.e.
      void World.removeItemsAt(Location l)
      It removes items from the given location
      Location Location.substract(Location loc)
      Method used to substract locations in the same world.
      Constructors in model with parameters of type Location 
      Constructor and Description
      Location(Location loc)
      Constructor used to create a new location which is copied from another location.
